name: veil
sizes_available: radius (from neck along the back): 53 cm / 21‚Äù
notes:
this delicate crochet shawl combines silk, mohair, and a hint of sparkle from sequins. light and airy, it features an open lace pattern that drapes beautifully. the subtle shimmer of the sequins catches the light, evoking the soft glimmer of fresh snow in the sun. perfect for winter festivities or elegant holiday gatherings - a rewarding project for experienced hands.

materials
3 balls of friends kid silk color 02
3 skeins of party deluxe color creme
crochet hook 5 mm (h-8) 
scissors
stitch markers
tape measure
